targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
CAST(recvTime as datetime) as "time",
CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'irrigationInMilimiters' THEN attrValue END) as Decimal(5,2)) as recommendation
from `urn_ngsi-ld_IrrigationRecommendation_1_IrrigationRecommendation`
WHERE attrName = "irrigationInMilimiters" and date(recvTime) = curdate() - interval 1 day
GROUP BY recvTime, "time"
ORDER BY "time" DESC

SELECT 
CAST(recvTime as datetime) as "time",
CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'irrigationInMilimiters' THEN attrValue END) as Decimal(5,2)) as recommendation
from `urn_ngsi-ld_IrrigationRecommendation_2_IrrigationRecommendation`
WHERE attrName = "irrigationInMilimiters" and date(recvTime) = curdate() - interval 1 day
GROUP BY recvTime, "time"
ORDER BY "time" DESC

SELECT 
CAST(recvTime as datetime) as "time",
CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'irrigationInMilimiters' THEN attrValue END) as Decimal(5,2)) as recommendation
from `urn_ngsi-ld_IrrigationRecommendation_1_IrrigationRecommendation`
WHERE attrName = "irrigationInMilimiters" and date(recvTime) = curdate()
GROUP BY recvTime, "time"
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT 
CAST(recvTime as datetime) as "time",
CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'irrigationInMilimiters' THEN attrValue END) as Decimal(5,2)) as recommendation
from `urn_ngsi-ld_IrrigationRecommendation_2_IrrigationRecommendation`
WHERE attrName = "irrigationInMilimiters" and date(recvTime) = curdate()
GROUP BY recvTime, "time"
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT
  CAST(recvTime as datetime) as "time",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'soilMoistureCalibratedDepth1' THEN attrValue END) as Decimal(5,2)) as "Soil Moisture 1",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'soilMoistureCalibratedDepth2' THEN attrValue END)as Decimal(5,2)) as "Soil Moisture 2"
FROM lab.`urn_ngsi-ld_SoilProbe_1_SoilProbe`
GROUP BY recvTime, "time"
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT
  CAST(recvTime as datetime) as "time",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'airHumidity' THEN attrValue END) as Decimal(5,2)) as "Air Humidity"
FROM lab.`urn_ngsi-ld_SoilProbe_1_SoilProbe`
GROUP BY recvTime, "time"
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT
  CAST(recvTime as datetime) as "time",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'airTemperature' THEN attrValue END) as Decimal(5,2)) as "Air Temperature",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'soilTemperature' THEN attrValue END) as Decimal(5,2)) as "Soil Temperature"
FROM lab.`urn_ngsi-ld_SoilProbe_1_SoilProbe`
GROUP BY recvTime, "time"
ORDER BY "time"

SELECT
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "c_sp1_open" THEN attrValue END) as "Control SP1",
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "c_sp2_open" THEN attrValue END) as "Control SP2",
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "c_sp3_open" THEN attrValue END) as "Control SP3"
FROM IrrigationSystem_Device
GROUP By recvTime
order by recvTime

SELECT
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "pump_closed" THEN attrValue END) as "Pump Closed",
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "pump_q" THEN attrValue END) as "Pump Q"
FROM IrrigationSystem_Device
GROUP By recvTime
order by recvTime

SELECT
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "f_sp1_open" THEN attrValue END) as "Fuzzy SP1",
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "f_sp2_open" THEN attrValue END) as "Fuzzy SP2",
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "f_sp3_open" THEN attrValue END) as "Fuzzy SP3"
FROM IrrigationSystem_Device
GROUP By recvTime
order by recvTime

SELECT
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "c_sp1_q" THEN attrValue END) as "Control SP1 Q",
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "c_sp2_q" THEN attrValue END) as "Control SP2 Q",
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "c_sp3_q" THEN attrValue END) as "Control SP3 Q"
FROM IrrigationSystem_Device
GROUP By recvTime
order by recvTime

SELECT
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "control_ir" THEN attrValue END) as "Control Recommendation",
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "fuzzy_ir" THEN attrValue END) as "Fuzzy Recommendation"
FROM IrrigationSystem_Device
GROUP By recvTime

SELECT
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "f_sp1_q" THEN attrValue END) as "Fuzzy SP1 Q",
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "f_sp2_q" THEN attrValue END) as "Fuzzy SP2 Q",
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "f_sp3_q" THEN attrValue END) as "Fuzzy SP3 Q"
FROM IrrigationSystem_Device
GROUP By recvTime
order by recvTime

SELECT
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "c_sp1_v" THEN attrValue END) as "Control SP1 V",
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "c_sp2_v" THEN attrValue END) as "Control SP2 V",
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "c_sp3_v" THEN attrValue END) as "Control SP3 V"
FROM IrrigationSystem_Device
GROUP By recvTime
order by recvTime

SELECT
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "manualoperation" THEN attrValue END) as "Manual Operation"
FROM IrrigationSystem_Device
GROUP By recvTime
order by recvTime

SELECT
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "f_sp1_v" THEN attrValue END) as "Fuzzy SP1 V",
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "f_sp2_v" THEN attrValue END) as "Fuzzy SP2 V",
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "f_sp3_v" THEN attrValue END) as "Fuzzy SP3 V"
FROM IrrigationSystem_Device
GROUP By recvTime
order by recvTime

panels.description: Current Weather obtained from the Open Weather API

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'dateObserved' THEN attrValue END) as datetime) as "time",   
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "temperature" THEN attrValue END)as decimal(5,2)) as "temperature",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "humidity" THEN attrValue END) as decimal(5,2)) as "humidity",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "pressure" THEN attrValue END) as decimal(5,2)) as "pressure",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "windDeg" THEN attrValue END)as decimal(5,2)) as "windDeg", 
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "windSpeed" THEN attrValue END) as decimal(5,2)) as "windSpeed Degree"
  FROM WeatherCurrent_WeatherCurrent
  GROUP BY recvTime 
  ORDER BY recvTime desc

panels.title: Current Weather - Open Weather

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'dateObserved' THEN attrValue END) as datetime) as "Date",   
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "temperature" THEN attrValue END)as decimal(5,2)) as "Temperature",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "humidity" THEN attrValue END) as decimal(5,2)) as "Humidity",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "pressure" THEN attrValue END) as decimal(5,2)) as "Pressure",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "windDeg" THEN attrValue END)as decimal(5,2)) as "WindDeg",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "windSpeed" THEN attrValue END)as decimal(5,2)) as "windSpeed", 
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "precipTotal" THEN attrValue END) as decimal(5,2)) as "Precip 1H"
  FROM WeatherCurrentWunder_WeatherCurrentWunder
  GROUP BY recvTime 
  ORDER BY recvTime desc
  limit 8;

SELECT
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'dateObserved' THEN attrValue END) as datetime) as "time",   
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "temperature" THEN attrValue END)as decimal(5,2)) as "temperature"
  FROM WeatherCurrent_WeatherCurrent
  GROUP BY recvTime, "time"
  ORDER BY "time"

SELECT
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'dateObserved' THEN attrValue END) as datetime) as "time",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "humidity" THEN attrValue END) as decimal(5,2)) as "humidity"
  FROM WeatherCurrent_WeatherCurrent
  GROUP BY recvTime, "time"
  ORDER BY "time"

SELECT
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'dateObserved' THEN attrValue END) as "time",   
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "temperature" THEN attrValue END)as decimal(5,2)) as "Temperature"
  FROM WeatherCurrentWunder_WeatherCurrentWunder
  GROUP BY recvTime

SELECT
  MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'dateObserved' THEN attrValue END) as "time",   
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "humidity" THEN attrValue END)as decimal(5,2)) as "Humidity"
  FROM WeatherCurrentWunder_WeatherCurrentWunder
  GROUP BY recvTime

panels.description: Weather Forecast for the next 7 days. Obtained from the Open Weather API.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'dateForecast' THEN attrValue END) as datetime) as "Date",   
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "probability" THEN attrValue END)as decimal(5,2)) as "PrecipProb",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "rain" THEN attrValue END) as decimal(5,2)) as "rain",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "temperatureMax" THEN attrValue END) as decimal(5,2)) as "TempMax",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "temperatureMin" THEN attrValue END) as decimal(5,2)) as "TempMin"
  FROM lab.WeatherForecast_WeatherForecast 
  GROUP BY recvTime 
  ORDER BY recvTime desc
  limit 8;

panels.title: Weather Forecast  - OpenWeather

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN 'dateForecast' THEN attrValue END) as datetime) as "Date",   
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "Precipitation" THEN attrValue END)as decimal(5,2)) as "Precipitation",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "temperatureMax" THEN attrValue END) as decimal(5,2)) as "TempMax",
  CAST(MAX(CASE attrName WHEN "temperatureMin" THEN attrValue END) as decimal(5,2)) as "TempMin"
  FROM lab.WeatherForecastWunder_WeatherForecastWunder
  GROUP BY recvTime 
  ORDER BY recvTime desc
  limit 5;
